sourcesContent:
import Navbar from "./Navbar";
import Card from "./Card";
import "./Speak.css";

export default function Speak() {
  const materialData = [
    {
      image:
        "https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-iebaKTHQCjr6Eyn.png?nc=1",
      level: "Level 1",
      category: [
        { Fruits: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/fruits_mes/" },
        { Vegetable: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/vegetables_mes/" },
      ],
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-AiQZOkzr0QgHFoS.png?nc=1",
      level: "Level 2",
      category: [{ Animals: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/animals_mes/" }],
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-Bt00ktU94ujTZRu.png?nc=1",
      level: "Level 3",
      category: [
        { Color: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/color_mes/" },
        { Food: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/food_mes/" },
      ],
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-DOteWqCqUBbiKSM.png?nc=1",
      level: "Level 4",
      category: [
        { Number: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/numbers_mes/" },
        { Feelings: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/feelings_mes/" },
      ],
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-GfQ9AVpiMYYwD0v.png?nc=1",
      level: "Level 5",
      category: [
        { "Body parts": "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/body_parts_mes/" },
        { Family: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/family_mes/" },
        { Clothes: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/clothes_mes/" },
      ],
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-OXb1s3u9AKq0zZh.png?nc=1",
      level: "Level 6",
      category: [
        { Furniture: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/furniture_mes/" },
        { House: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/house_mes/" },
      ],
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-1ucIyBrGWs1yJCo.png?nc=1",
      level: "Level 7",
      category: [
        { Verbs: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/verbs_mes/" },
        {
          "Sea creatures": "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/sea_creature_mes/",
        },
      ],
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-RUd0NKgp53VyHHu.png?nc=1",
      level: "Level 8",
      category: [
        { Weather: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/weather_mes/" },
        { Nature: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/nature_mes/" },
        { Insect: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/insect_mes/" },
        { Shape: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/shape_mes/" },
      ],
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-3HYbiHTFdCXInZa.png?nc=1",
      level: "Level 9",
      category: [
        { Vehicle: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/vehicles_mes/" },
        { Town: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/town_mes/" },
        { Travel: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/travel_mes/" },
      ],
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-UfU5rHjT3OeMisY.png?nc=1",
      level: "Level 10",
      category: [
        { "Months & Week": "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/months_week_mes/" },
        { Season: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/season_mes/" },
        { Events: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/daily_event_mes/" },
      ],
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-wbfxM0Afio3Xtzt.png?nc=1",
      level: "Level 11",
      category: [
        { Stationery: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/stationery_mes/" },
        { School: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/school_mes/" },
        { Sports: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/sports_mes/" },
        { Instrument: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/instrument_mes/" },
      ],
    },
    {
      image:
        "https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-b9031Sh4JXdWPFc.png?nc=1",
      level: "Level 12",
      category: [
        { Country: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/country_mes/" },
        { Jobs: "https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/job_mes/" },
      ],
    },
  ];

  return (
    <>
      <Navbar />
      <section className="speak">
        {materialData.map((item, index) => (
          <Card
            key={index}
            classNameImage="image"
            src={item.image}
            alt={`Level ${item.level} Image`}
            title={`${item.level}`}
            category={item.category}
          />
        ))}

        {/* <Card
          classNameImage="image"
          src="https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-iebaKTHQCjr6Eyn.png?nc=1"
          alt="fruit and vegs image"
          title="Level 1"
          href="https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/fruits_mes/"
          label="Fruits"
        /> */}
        {/* 
        <Card
          classNameImage="image"
          src="https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-AiQZOkzr0QgHFoS.png?nc=1"
          alt="animals image"
          title="Level 2"
          href="https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/animals_mes/"
          label="Animals"
        />

        <Card
          classNameImage="image"
          src="https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-Bt00ktU94ujTZRu.png?nc=1"
          alt="colors image"
          title="Level 3"
          href="https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/food_mes/"
          label="Food"
        />

        <Card
          classNameImage="image"
          src="https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-DOteWqCqUBbiKSM.png?nc=1"
          alt="colors image"
          title="Level 4"
          href="https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/numbers_mes/"
          label="Number"
        />
        <Card
          classNameImage="image"
          src="https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-GfQ9AVpiMYYwD0v.png?nc=1"
          alt="colors image"
          title="Level 5"
          href="https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/family_mes/"
          label="Family"
        />
        <Card
          classNameImage="image"
          src="https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-OXb1s3u9AKq0zZh.png?nc=1"
          alt="colors image"
          title="Level 6"
          href="https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/house_mes/"
          label="House"
        />
        <Card
          classNameImage="image"
          src="https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-1ucIyBrGWs1yJCo.png?nc=1"
          alt="colors image"
          title="Level 7"
          href="https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/sea_creature_mes/"
          label="Sea creatures"
        />
        <Card
          classNameImage="image"
          src="https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-RUd0NKgp53VyHHu.png?nc=1"
          alt="colors image"
          title="Level 8"
          href="https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/insect_mes/"
          label="Insect"
        />
        <Card
          classNameImage="image"
          src="https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-3HYbiHTFdCXInZa.png?nc=1"
          alt="colors image"
          title="Level 9"
          href="https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/vehicles_mes/"
          label="Vehicle"
        />
        <Card
          classNameImage="image"
          src="https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-UfU5rHjT3OeMisY.png?nc=1"
          alt="colors image"
          title="Level 10"
          href="https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/months_week_mes/"
          label="Months & Week"
        />
        <Card
          classNameImage="image"
          src="https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-wbfxM0Afio3Xtzt.png?nc=1"
          alt="colors image"
          title="Level 11"
          href="https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/school_mes/"
          label="School"
        />
        <Card
          classNameImage="image"
          src="https://hotpotmedia.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/8-b9031Sh4JXdWPFc.png?nc=1"
          alt="colors image"
          title="Level 12"
          href="https://maimaiokinawa.github.io/country_mes/"
          label="Country"
        /> */}
      </section>
    </>
  );
}
